instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Under 'WIRELESS NETWORKS', tap Call . Under 'INCOMING CALL' tap Call reject . Tap Call reject mode . A pop-up message displays with three choices. Tap Reject calls on list . Tap Cancel to close the pop-up message. Tap Reject calls from . If desired, select the Private Numbers check box to reject all calls from private numbers. Tap the icon. Select one of the following: Contacts Select the desired contact, and then tap Done . Call logs Select the desired call log entry, and then tap Done . New number Enter the phone number, and then tap Save .

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Under 'WIRELESS NETWORKS', tap Call . Under 'INCOMING CALL' tap Call reject . Tap Reject calls from > Trash can icon. Select the number(s) you want to unblock. Tap Select all to select all numbers in the list. Tap Delete . Tap Yes to confirm.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the Networks tab. Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Enter the phone number you want to forward calls to. To select a number from a saved contact, tap the Contacts icon. Tap Enable .

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the Networks tab. Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Under 'FORWARD IF,' select from the following: Busy Unanswered Unreachable Edit the phone number you want to forward calls to as necessary. To select a number from a saved contact, tap the Contacts icon. Tap Update .
From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the Networks tab. Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Tap Disable .

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Under 'WIRELESS NETWORKS', tap Call . Tap Additional Settings . Tap Caller ID . Choose from the following: Network default Hide number Show number
From any Home screen, tap Phone . Tap the Call logs tab. Tap the Menu key. Tap Clear all . Tap Yes to confirm.
From any Home screen, tap Phone . Tap the Call logs tab. Select a call log entry to view more details.
